# HTML &lt;mark&gt; Tag for CKEditor 4

![Release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/peter-neumann-dev/markTag?color=10B981&sort=semver&style=for-the-badge)
![CKEditor Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/CKEditor-4-3B82F6?style=for-the-badge)
![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/peter-neumann-dev/markTag?style=for-the-badge)

**A CKEditor plugin to wrap text with an HTML &lt;mark&gt; Tag**

![Demo screenshot](assets/demo-screenshot.png)

## ‚úèÔ∏è What will it do?

This plugin will add a new button with the possibility to wrap text with an `<mark>` HTML tag.

**Included translations:**<br>
üá¨üáß üá∫üá∏ English<br>
üá©üá™ German

## üöÄ Quickstart

1. Download the latest üîñ [Release](https://github.com/peter-neumann-dev/markTag/releases)
2. Include the plugin to your CKEditor setup `[path to your CKEditor]/plugins/`
3. Add markTag to external plugins:

```javascript
config.extraPlugins = 'markTag';
```
